channel.title: [317-Delta] Shop, Buy 50? Buy X?
channel.description:
I have honestly never been this confused about my server. :eek: :confused: :confused:
So my buy 50 option says "buy 50", but it only buys 10.
I have searched every single (basically) file in my source looking for "buy" and have found nothing.
Where would it be to change it, and how would I change it? Also, how could I add a buy X?
Thank you
